comments: When I select the link Tutorials-->Explore the user interface-->Browse process content, or the link below (or see URL above) http://127.0.0.1:50702/help/index.jsp?topic=/org.eclipse.epf.help.doc/html/tutorials/tut1_ex3.htm i get the following exception. seems that the HTML of this help page has a bug. thanks, Bernhard.
